mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_board_attach (attach_no, notice_no, file_name, file_path, uuid, is_image, thumb_path, sort_order) VALUES (NOTICE_BOARD_ATTACH_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{noticeNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isImage, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{thumbPath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.select: SELECT attach_no AS attachNo, notice_no AS noticeNo, file_name AS fileName, file_path AS filePath, uuid, is_image AS isImage, thumb_path AS thumbPath, sort_order AS sortOrder FROM notice_board_attach WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo} ORDER BY sort_order, attach_no
